Class SortedViewBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gnahraf.io.buffer.Block

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sorted

    public class SortedViewBlock
extends SortedBlock
    This class takes presents a sorted view of of an unsorted block.
